attributes.action: Supply free solar panels to all homes in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Due to the cost of living crisis and continuing rising energy costs the government should provide free solar panels to all UK homes to reduce costs  provide green energy and reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
attributes.background: Supply free solar panel grants to all homes. Encourage energy suppliers to get on board with supplying solar panels. The massive profits they are making can be taxed and used to help fund the project.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613855
